tika-vin07t55:2_0: 479. Sedamocanagāthāsu akappiyasambhogoti anupasampannehi saddhiṁ kātuṁ paṭikkhitto
tika-vin07t55:2_1: uposathādisaṁvāso eva vutto. Pañhā mesāti ettha ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Esāti ca
tika-vin07t55:2_2: liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṁ, pañho esoti attho. Pañha-saddo vā dviliṅgo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t55:3_0: Garubhaṇḍaṁ sandhāyāti garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattanaṁ sandhāya. Dasāti dasa
tika-vin07t55:3_1: avandiyapuggale. Ekādaseti abhabbapuggale. Sikkhāya asādhāraṇoti khurabhaṇḍaṁ dhāretuṁ
tika-vin07t55:4_0: Ubbhakkhake na vadāmīti akkhato uddhaṁ sīse ṭhitamukhamaggepi pārājikaṁ sandhāya
tika-vin07t55:4_1: na vadāmi. Adhonābhinti nābhito heṭṭhā ṭhitavaccapassāvamaggepi vivajjiya aññasmiṁ
tika-vin07t55:4_2: sarīrappadese methunadhammapaccayā kathaṁ pārājiko siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t55:8_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Tādisāya hi kuṭiyā bahi ṭhatvā anto ṭhitāya itthiyā magge dussādinā santhataṁ
tika-vin07t55:8_2: katvā pavesentopi pārājiko siyā. Liṅgaparivattaṁ sandhāya vuttāti liṅge parivatte
tika-vin07t55:8_3: paṭiggahaṇassa vijahanato puna appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjanāpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t55:9: Pāḷiyaṁ bhikkhū siyā vīsatiyā samāgatāti vīsatiyā saṅkhātāya bhikkhū samāgatā, etena sabbakammārahataṁ saṅghassa dasseti.
tika-vin07t55:10_0: Nivatthoti gāthāya antaravāsakena nivattho uttarāsaṅgena diguṇaṁ katvā pārutasaṅghāṭiyo.
tika-vin07t55:10_1: Iti tāni tīṇipi cīvarāni kāye gatāneva bhikkhuniyā bindumattaṁ kāḷakaṁ udakena dhovitamatte
tika-vin07t55:11_0: Itthiṁ haneti gāthāya na mātubhūtaṁ itthiṁ haneyya, na pitubhūtaṁ purisaṁ haneyya.
tika-vin07t55:11_1: Anariyanti tañca anarahantameva haneyya, etena arahantaghātakopi na hotīti dasseti.
